description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
    
    New Features
   DIAGRAMNET-50156-Add support to import the macro enabled Drawing (.VSDM)
   DIAGRAMNET-50332-Add support to replace OLE object
   DIAGRAMNET-50566-Writing support for new MS Visio Macro-Enabled Drawing 2013 VSDM format
   DIAGRAMNET-50567-Writing support for new MS Visio Macro-Enabled Stencil 2013 VSSM format
   DIAGRAMNET-50568-Writing support for new MS Visio Macro-Enabled Stencil 2013 VSSM format
   DIAGRAMNET-50569-Add support to update the VBA Code   
   DIAGRAMNET-50859-Add support to import the macro enabled template (.VSTM)
   DIAGRAMNET-50860-Add support to import the macro enabled stencil (.VSSM)
   
    Bugs    
   DIAGRAMNET-50701-VSDX to PDF export - the shape's boundary color overlaps the internal structure
   DIAGRAMNET-50790-Diagram exception occurred while loading a VSDX file  
   DIAGRAMNET-50793-The text items are missing on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50794-The text items are missing on converting a VSD to PNG  
   DIAGRAMNET-50795-The text items are missing on converting a VSD to JPG   
   DIAGRAMNET-50796-The transparent background of images turns into white color on converting VSD to PDF
